name: Spirit of Serene Fire
effect: On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Lineage Release — Recover 6. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)
effect_raw:
On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. 

Lineage Release — Recover 6. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)

rule.description: Card in a champion's inner lineage means it must be in that lineage, but not the top card of it.

flavor: Searing insight found within all-consuming flame.

name: Spirit of Serene Water
effect: On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Lineage Release — Recover 6. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)
effect_raw:
On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. 

Lineage Release — Recover 6. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)

rule.description: Card in a champion's inner lineage means it must be in that lineage, but not the top card of it.

flavor: Overflowing visions immersed within the waves.

name: Spirit of Serene Wind
effect: On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. Lineage Release — Recover 6. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)
effect_raw:
On Enter: Glimpse 6. Draw six cards. 

Lineage Release — Recover 6. (Activate this ability by banishing this card from your champion's inner lineage.)

rule.description: Card in a champion's inner lineage means it must be in that lineage, but not the top card of it.

flavor: Cunning intuition trapped within the vortex's eye.

name: Merlin, Kingslayer
effect: Merlin Lineage At the beginning of your recollection phase, put a level counter on Merlin. Then, if there's an even amount of level counters on Merlin, draw a card and Merlin's attacks get +2 until end of turn.
effect_raw:
Merlin Lineage
At the beginning of your recollection phase, put a level counter on Merlin. Then, if there's an even amount of level counters on Merlin, draw a card and Merlin's attacks get +2[power] until end of turn.

name: Azure Protective Trinket
effect: Banish Azure Protective Trinket: Banish up to three target fire element cards from a single graveyard.
effect_raw: Banish Azure Protective Trinket: Banish up to three target fire element cards from a single graveyard.
flavor: An enchanted pendant that provides soothing relief from the scorching summer heat.

name: Crimson Protective Trinket
effect: Banish Crimson Protective Trinket: Target opponent reveals two cards at random from their memory. Banish each wind element card revealed this way.
effect_raw: Banish Crimson Protective Trinket: Target opponent reveals two cards at random from their memory. Banish each wind element card revealed this way.
flavor: A magical armlet that channels and disperses galestorm winds into a pleasant puff of air.

name: Quicksilver Grail
effect: Divine Relic (You can only have one card with this keyword in your material deck.) On Enter: Banish a non-champion card from your material deck face down. Banish Quicksilver Grail: You may play the banished card. (You still pay for its costs.)
effect_raw:
Divine Relic

On Enter: Banish a non-champion card from your material deck face down.

Banish Quicksilver Grail: You may play the banished card. (You still pay for its costs.)

rule.description: The face down banished by Quicksilver Grail has no properties. It has no name, types, effects, or stats. This means that effects that interact with cards in banishment that require seeing a certain property such as 'Sword' subtype won't be able to interact with this face down card.
The owner of the face down card may look at it at any time.

When Quicksilver Grail is banished to play the face down banished card, you play that card using its default play type. If the card has a reserve cost, that card is activated. If the card has a memory cost, that card is materialized.
The face down banished card being played still checks for elemental requirements and its costs must be paid.

editions.effect: Divine Relic On Enter: Banish a non-champion card from your material deck face down. Banish Quicksilver Grail: You may play the banished card.

name: Tariff Ring
effect: Banish Tariff Ring: Until end of turn, players can't declare attacks unless they pay 2for each attack declaration. Activate this ability only during an opponent's recollection phase.
effect_raw: Banish Tariff Ring: Until end of turn, players can't declare attacks unless they pay (2) for each attack declaration. Activate this ability only during an opponent's recollection phase.

rule.description: The (2) in Tariff Ring's attack condition is a reserve cost, and can be paid by resting objects with reservable.

flavor: If profits are to be made, bring enough to share.

name: Tithe Proclamation
effect: On Enter: Draw a card. Each player can't draw more than three cards each turn unless it's their first turn of the game.
effect_raw:
On Enter: Draw a card.

Players can't draw more than three cards each turn unless it's their first turn of the game.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: Players can't draw more than three cards each turn unless it's their first turn of the game. -> Each player can't draw more than three cards each turn unless it's their first turn of the game.

flavor: Wealth can only be amassed up to a certain point before the church of Aesa takes an interest.

name: Viridian Protective Trinket
effect: During your turn, water element cards your opponents activate cost 2 more to activate.
effect_raw: During your turn, water element cards your opponents activate cost 2 more to activate.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: Removed cost from ability. It is a static ability.

flavor: A charmed ring that funnels and tapers torrential downpours into a revitalizing mist.

name: Beastsoul Visage
effect: Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.) Linked ally gets +2, has pride 3, and is a Beast in addition to its other types.
effect_raw:
Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)

Linked ally gets +2power￰, has pride 3, and is a Beast in addition to its other types.

rule.description: Multiple instances of pride on an ally are redundant. Only the highest pride instance on the ally matters.

flavor: Even a small mutt can be made to look like a ferocious beast.

name: Explosive Rune
effect: Banish Explosive Rune: Deal 1 damage to target ally. Class Bonus: If that ally is attacking, deal 2 damage to it instead.
effect_raw: Banish Explosive Rune: Deal 1 damage to target ally. Class Bonus: If that ally is attacking, deal 2 damage to it instead.
flavor: The labrynthine catacombs of Varuck are littered with both inventions and victims of mad wizards.

name: Firetongue
effect: Class BonusOn Attack: You may banish a fire element card from your graveyard. If you do, put a durability counter on Firetongue.
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Attack: You may banish a fire element card from your graveyard. If you do, put a durability counter on Firetongue.
flavor: A serrated blade forged from a dragon's fang. Only dragonsbreath can maintain its edge.

name: Varuckan Soulknife
effect: Class BonusElement BonusYou may banish three fire element cards from your graveyard to activate this card from your material deck. Class BonusOn Kill: Put a card named Varuckan Soulknife from your banishment into your material deck.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] [Element Bonus] You may banish three fire element cards from your graveyard to activate this card from your material deck.

[Class Bonus] On Kill: Return Varuckan Soulknife to your material deck.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: Return Varuckan Soulknife to your material deck. -> Put a card named Varuckan Soulknife from your banishment into your material deck.

name: Arondight, Azure Blade
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: You may banish any amount of cards with floating memory from your graveyard. For each card banished this way, put a refinement counter on Arondight. Arondight gets +2 for each refinement counter on it.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] On Enter: You may banish any amount of cards with floating memory from your graveyard. For each card banished this way, put a refinement counter on Arondight. 

Arondight gets +2 power for each refinement counter on it.

name: Cloak of Stillwater
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Draw a card. , Banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to your champion this turn.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] On Enter: Draw a card. 

Rest, Banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to your champion this turn.
flavor: Weaved with the illusory gossamer of Stillwater.

name: Wand of Frost
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: Draw a card. Banish Wand of Frost: Target unit's attacks get -3 until end of turn.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] On Enter: Draw a card.

Banish Wand of Frost: Target unit's attacks get -3 power until end of turn.
flavor: Wielded by the apostles of the Lumina Sanctuary, this wand chills even the most heated of threats.

name: Wildheart Lyre
effect: Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.) Class BonusWhenever you rest Wildheart Lyre to pay for the reserve cost of a Harmony or Melody activation, put a buff counter on an Animal or Beast ally you control.
effect_raw:
Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)

[Class Bonus] Whenever you rest Wildheart Lyre to pay for the reserve cost of a Harmony or Melody activation, put a buff counter on an Animal or Beast ally you control.

name: Effigy of Gaia
effect: Class BonusYour champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally. Whenever an opponent activates an attack card with cleave, Animal and Beast allies you control get +2 until end of turn.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Your champion gets +1 level as long as you control an Animal or Beast ally.

Whenever an opponent activates an attack card with cleave, Animal and Beast allies you control get +2 Life until end of turn.

name: Ventus, Staff of Zephyrs
effect: Whenever you activate a wind element Mage Spell, put a refinement counter on Ventus. , Remove a refinement counter from Ventus: Put an enlighten counter on your champion. , Remove three refinement counters from Ventus: Suppress target ally.
effect_raw:
Whenever you activate a wind element Mage Spell, put a refinement counter on Wind Bauble. 

Rest, Remove a refinement counter from Wind Bauble: Put an enlighten counter on your champion. 

Rest, Remove three refinement counters from Wind Bauble: Suppress target ally.

name: Windwalker Boots
effect: Class BonusAt the beginning of your end phase, if your champion is awake, put a preparation counter on them. Banish Windwalker Boots: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has five or more preparation counters on them.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] At the beginning of your end phase, if your champion is awake, put a preparation counter on them.

Banish Windwalker Boots: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if your champion has five or more preparation counters on them.

name: Zephyr's Edge
effect: Class BonusOn Enter: If it's not your materialize phase, Zephyr's Edge gets +1 until end of turn.
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Enter: If it's not your materialize phase, Zephyr's Edge gets +1 Power until end of turn.
flavor: Lighter than the breeze, swifter than the wind.

name: The Majestic Spirit
effect: Intercept, True Sight, Vigor Champions you control have spellshroud. If another crux element unit you control would take damage, prevent half of that damage, rounded up.
effect_raw:
Intercept, True Sight, Vigor

Champions you control have spellshroud.

If another crux element unit you control would take damage, prevent half of that damage, rounded up.

rule.description: Because The Majestic Spirit is a regalia, if it would be sent to the deck, memory, or hand, it is sent to its owner's material deck instead. If it would die, it is banished instead (On Kill effects won't trigger).

name: Fractured Crown
effect: Champion Link (This object enters the field linked to target champion. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.) Linked champion's first attack each turn gets +2. Class Bonus: That champion also gets +2 for each unique ally card in your graveyard.
effect_raw:
Champion Link (This object enters the field linked to target champion. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)

Linked champion's first attack each turn gets +2 power. Class Bonus: That champion also gets +2 life for each unique ally card in your graveyard.

rule.description: 'Unique' ally refers to ally cards with the unique type, not ally cards with different names.
Fractured Crown remains linked to the linked champion if that champion delevels.

name: Covenant of Thorns
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 1 less to materialize. Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.) If damage would be dealt to your champion, that damage is dealt to linked ally instead.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to materialize.

Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)

If damage would be dealt to your champion, that damage is dealt to linked ally instead.

rule.description: The type of damage that gets redirected to the linked ally stays the same.
If damage from an attack is redirected to the linked ally, On Hit and On Kill effects can still trigger with normal conditions.

name: Bedivere, Woodland Overseer
effect: Bedivere has taunt as long as you control another Animal or Beast ally. Class BonusLevel 3+On Death: Put a buff counter on each Animal and/or Beast ally you control.
effect_raw:
Bedivere has taunt as long as you control another Animal or Beast ally.

[Class Bonus] [Level 3+] On Death: Put a buff counter on each Animal and/or Beast ally you control.
flavor: "Who dares to threaten the wilds?"

name: Blanche, Sheltering Saint
effect: Level 2+Fast Activation (You may activate this card at fast speed.) If another unit you control would be dealt non-attack damage, prevent an amount of that damage equal to the amount of cards in your memory.
effect_raw:
[Level 2+] Fast Activation (You may activate this card at fast speed.)

If another unit you control would be dealt non-attack damage, prevent an amount of that damage equal to the amount of cards in your memory.

name: Capricious Lynx
effect: Pride 4 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 4 or higher.) Class BonusOn Enter: Capricious Lynx loses all abilities until end of turn.
effect_raw:
Pride 4 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 4 or higher.)

[Class Bonus] On Enter: Capricious Lynx loses all abilities until end of turn.
flavor: Quick to action, quicker to defiance.

name: Cunning Broker
effect: Stealth(This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.) , Remove two preparation counters from your champion: Draw a card.
effect_raw:
Stealth (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)

 Rest, Remove two preparation counters from your champion: Draw a card.
flavor: Handling coins is but second nature.

name: Dawn of Ashes
effect: Upkeep — At the beginning of your recollection phase, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is not norm element, sacrifice Dawn of Ashes. Non-norm element cards cost 1 more to activate.
effect_raw:
Upkeep — At the beginning of your recollection phase, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is not norm element, sacrifice Dawn of Ashes.

Non-norm element cards cost 1 more to activate.

rule.description: During the resolution of Dawn of Ashes' upkeep ability, if there are no cards in the controller's memory, then no card is revealed to check the element of and Dawn of Ashes won't be sacrificed.

name: Develop Mana
effect: Put a level counter on your champion. (Champions get +1 level for each level counter on them.)
effect_raw: Put a level counter on your champion. (Champions get +1 level for each level counter on them.)
flavor: From enlightenment comes transcendance.

name: Fast Cure
effect: If target opponent's influence is greater than yours, recover 4. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.) Floating Memory
effect_raw:
If target opponent's influence is greater than yours, recover 4. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.)

Floating Memory
flavor: A brief respite in dire times may give enough focus to birth a plan.

name: Fractal of Insight
effect: On Enter: You may rest Fractal of Insight. If you do, glimpse 2. Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
On Enter: You may rest Fractal of Insight. If you do, glimpse 2.

Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)
flavor: An enigma that defies, and yet, shapes reality.

name: Gawain, Chivalrous Thief
effect: Level 2+True Sight Class BonusOn Champion Hit: You may sacrifice Gawain. If you do, look at that opponent's memory and discard a card from it.
effect_raw:
[Level 2+] True Sight

[Class Bonus] On Champion Hit: You may sacrifice Gawain. If you do, look at that opponent's memory and discard a card from it.

rule.description: In Gawain's On Champion Hit effect, 'that opponent' refers to the player that controls the hit champion.

flavor: A master spy and notorious thief who never misses.

name: Gentle Respite
effect: If target opponent's influence is greater than yours, draw a card into your memory. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.) Floating Memory
effect_raw:
If target opponent's influence is greater than yours, draw a card into your memory. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.)

Floating Memory

name: Imperious Highlander
effect: On Enter: Imperious Highlander gets +X until end of turn where X is the amount of allies target opponent controls more than you control.
effect_raw: On Enter: Imperious Highlander gets +X power until end of turn where X is the amount of allies target opponent controls more than you control.
flavor: Against all odds and against an insurmountable front, there can be only one answer.

editions.flavor: "You indolent wretches will be cut down by my ascendant mastery of the blade."

name: Lancelot, Goliath of Aesa
effect: Hindered (This ally enters the field rested.) Class BonusLevel 2+Lancelot gets +2. On Attack: You may pay 3. If you do, Lancelot gets +3 until end of turn.
effect_raw:
Hindered (This ally enters the field rested.)

[Class Bonus] [Level 2+] Lancelot gets +2 life.

On Attack: You may pay 3. If you do, Lancelot gets +3 power until end of turn.

rule.description: The (3) in Lancelot's On Attack ability is a reserve cost, and can be paid by resting objects with reservable.

flavor: "I greet the burden of a thousand lives..."

name: Lurking Assailant
effect: Lurking Assailant has stealth as long as it's awake. Level 1+Lurking Assailant may retaliate against attackers while not defending.
effect_raw:
Lurking Assailant has stealth as long as it's awake.

[Level 1+] Lurking Assailant may retaliate against attackers while not defending.

rule.description: Lurking Assailant's [Level 1+] ability allows it to retaliate against attackers even if that attacker isn't attacking Lurking Assailant. For example, if the opponent is attacking your champion with an ally, Lurking Assailant can retaliate. During that damage step, your champion will take damage from the attacking ally, and Lurking Assailant will deal damage to that attacking ally.

flavor: Some assassins prove their skill with a dagger, others prove it with a glib tongue and twisted schemes.

name: Morgan, Soul Guide
effect: Level 1+Prevent all non-attack damage that would be dealt to Morgan. Level 2+Your opponents can't recover. Class BonusAt the beginning of your recollection phase, you may glimpse 1. If you don't, recover 1.
effect_raw:
[Level 1+] Prevent all non-attack damage that would be dealt to Morgan.

[Level 2+] Your opponents can't recover.

[Class Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, you may glimpse 1. If you don't, recover 1.

name: Ordinary Bear
effect: Pride 2 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 2 or higher.) Class BonusFloating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Pride 2 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 2 or higher.) 

[Class Bonus] Floating Memory

name: Peaceful Reunion
effect:
Activate this card only if you have not declared an attack this turn.
Until the beginning of your next turn, you and target player can't declare attacks. Banish Peaceful Reunion.
effect_raw:
Activate this card only if you have not declared an attack this turn.

Until the beginning of your next turn, you and target player can't declare attacks. Banish Peaceful Reunion.

name: Prismatic Sanctuary
effect: Upkeep — At the beginning of your recollection phase, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is not fire, water, nor wind element, sacrifice Prismatic Sanctuary. Fire, water, and wind elements are enabled for you.
effect_raw:
Upkeep — At the beginning of your recollection phase, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is not fire, water, nor wind element, sacrifice Prismatic Sanctuary.

Fire, water, and wind elements are enabled for you.

rule.description: During the resolution of Prismatic Sanctuary's upkeep ability, if there are no cards in the controller's memory, then no card is revealed to check the element of and Prismatic Sanctuary won't be sacrificed.

name: Resolute Stand
effect: Level 2+You may activate this card without paying its reserve cost. If you do, skip your next draw phase. If target unit would be dealt attack damage this turn, prevent 3 of that damage.
effect_raw:
[Level 2+] You may activate this card without paying its reserve cost. If you do, skip your next draw phase.

If target unit would be dealt attack damage this turn, prevent 3 of that damage.

rule.description: If multiple effects have a player skip the same phase, that player must skip that phase multiple times. For example, if two Resolute Stands were activated by a player without paying its reserve cost due to its ability, that player skips their next two draw phases.

flavor: "...with boundless resolve and forsakenness."

name: Right of Realm
effect: Whenever you activate a domain card, you may sacrifice Right of Realm. If you do, that domain enters the field without any of its upkeep abilities. Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Whenever you activate a domain card, you may sacrifice Right of Realm. If you do, that domain enters the field without any of its upkeep abilities.
 
Floating Memory

name: Scavenging Raccoon
effect: On Enter: Banish up to two target cards from a single graveyard.
effect_raw: On Enter: Banish up to two target cards from a single graveyard.
flavor: Looters have conditioned these diligent creatures to scavenge the battlefield for any source of glint or glitter in exchange for a treat.

editions.flavor: With a nose for trash and an eye for treasure, these relentless scavengers will stop at nothing to fill their hoards with trinkets and baubles.

name: Seeking Shot
effect: Level 2+True Sight Class BonusSeeking Shot can't be retaliated. As long as the attacker is attacking a Human ally, Seeking Shot gets +3.
effect_raw:
[Level 2+] True Sight

[Class Bonus] Seeking Shot can't be retaliated.

As long as the attacker is attacking a Human ally, Seeking Shot gets +3 power.
flavor: Those hit seldom kow where the shot came from.

name: Stalwart Shieldmate
effect: Taunt (When declaring a target for an attack, awake units with taunt must be chosen over others if able.) Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Taunt (When declaring a target for an attack, awake units with taunt must be chosen over others if able.)

Floating Memory

name: Steady Verse
effect: Class Bonus The next Harmony action card you activate this turn costs 1 less to activate. Draw a card into your memory.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] The next Harmony action card you activate this turn costs 1 less to activate. 

Draw a card into your memory.
flavor: A rousing allegro before the crescendo.

name: Thieving Cut
effect: Prepare 1 (You may remove a preparation counter from your champion as you activate this card.) On Hit: If Thieving Cut was prepared, draw a card.
effect_raw:
Prepare 1 (You may remove a preparation counter from your champion as you activate this card.)

On Hit: If Thieving Cut was prepared, draw a card.
flavor: What's yours is mine.

name: Blazing Bowman
effect: Blazing Bowman's attacks can't be retaliated. On Enter: You may banish a fire element card from your graveyard. If you do, Blazing Bowman gets +2 end of turn.
effect_raw:
Blazing Bowman's attacks can't be retaliated.

On Enter: You may banish a fire element card from your graveyard. If you do, Blazing Bowman gets +2 power end of turn.

name: Corhazi Arsonist
effect: Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Corhazi Arsonist gains stealth until end of turn. If a unit hit by Corhazi Arsonist this turn would die, banish it instead.
effect_raw:
Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Corhazi Arsonist gains stealth until end of turn.

If a unit hit by Corhazi Arsonist this turn would die, banish it instead.

rule.description: If a unit hit by Corhazi Arsonist dies on the same turn, that unit is banished. This means that On Death effects won't trigger.

name: Flamebreak Chorus
effect: Class BonusFast Activation (You may activate this card at fast speed.) Target ally gets +2 until end of turn. If it's defending, wake it up, and it gets an additional +LV until end of turn.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Fast Activation (You may activate this card at fast speed.)

Target ally gets +2 power until end of turn. If it's defending, wake it up, and it gets an additional +LV power until end of turn.

name: Hone by Fire
effect: Target Sword weapon you control gets +2 until end of turn. Class Bonus: Put a durability counter on it.
effect_raw: Target Sword weapon you control gets +2 power until end of turn. Class Bonus: Put a durability counter on it.
flavor: Enwreathed and tempered in flame.

name: Incendiary Fractal
effect: On Enter: Deal 2 damage to target ally you don't control. Class Bonus: Deal 4 damage to that ally instead. Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
On Enter: Deal 2 damage to target ally you don't control. Class Bonus: Deal 4 damage to that ally instead.

Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Innervate Fury
effect: As an additional cost to activate this card, delevel your champion and recover 5. (To delevel your champion, return the top card of its lineage to its owner's material deck.) Deal 7 damage split among any amount of target allies.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to activate this card, delevel your champion and recover 5. (To delevel your champion, return the top card of its lineage to its owner's material deck.)

Deal 7 damage split among any amount of target allies.

rule.description: The additional cost of recover 5 means that there must be five damage counters to remove from your champion to pay this card's cost. If there are less than five damage counters on your champion, the additional cost can't be paid.
The targets and the amount of damage split to each target must be declared as Innervate Fury is being activated.

name: Red Slime
effect: Pride 3 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 3 or higher.) Class BonusOn Death: Deal damage to all allies equal to Red Slime's power.
effect_raw:
Pride 3 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 3 or higher.)

[Class Bonus] On Death: Deal damage to all allies equal to Red Slime's power.

rule.description: Red Slime's On Death ability looks at that object's last known power value before it left the field.

name: Varuckan Acolyte
effect: On Enter: Destroy target regalia with memory cost 0. Level 3+Varuckan Acolyte gets +3.
effect_raw:
On Enter: Destroy target regalia with memory cost 0.  

[Level 3+] Varuckan Acolyte gets +3 power.

rule.description: Varuckan Acolyte's On Enter ability does not specifically target a regalia that you don't control. This means that if you control the only regalia with memory cost 0, that regalia must be the target for this ability.

flavor: Some of the cabalistic rituals practiced among the mad cultists require material sacrifice.

name: Corhazi Trapper
effect: On Enter: Put a preparation counter on your champion. , Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Target unit's attacks get -3 until end of turn.
effect_raw:
On Enter: Put a preparation counter on your champion.

Rest, Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Target unit's attacks get -3 power until end of turn.
flavor: Well-placed traps to turn the tide.

name: Deep Sea Fractal
effect: Hindered (This object enters the field rested.) On Enter: Each player puts the top card of their deck into their graveyard. Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Hindered (This object enters the field rested.)

On Enter: Each player puts the top card of their deck into their graveyard.

Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Fractal of Intrusion
effect: On Enter: You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard. When you do, look at target opponent's memory and discard a card from it. Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
On Enter: You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard. When you do, look at target opponent's memory and discard a card from it.

Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)

name: Fracturize
effect: Target item or weapon becomes a Cleric Fractal phantasia with reservable and loses all other abilities. (This effect lasts indefinitely.) Floating Memory
effect_raw:
Target item or weapon becomes a Cleric Fractal phantasia with reservable and loses all other abilities. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

Floating Memory

rule.description: The target item or weapon loses all of its original types and subtypes.
The target item or weapon retains its name and any stats that it has.

flavor: "You'd stand a better chance fighting without them."

name: Frostbind
effect: Negate target card activation unless its controller pays 2. Banish the card that had its activation negated this way.
effect_raw: Negate target card activation unless its controller pays 2. Banish the card that had its activation negated this way.

rule.description: If Frostbind negates an attack card, the combat phase never gets to begin. This means that On Attack effects will not trigger. The attacker remains rested if resting that unit was an additional cost of that attack card.
The (2) in Frostbind's negate condition is a reserve cost, and can be paid by resting objects with reservable.

flavor: "O'Lumina who shelters us, bind those who seek us harm in frost. Grant us peace under your blessing."

name: Frostbinder Apostle
effect: Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.) Level 2+On Enter: Target rested ally you don't control gets -4 until end of turn.
effect_raw:
Intercept

[Level 2+] On Enter: Target rested ally you don't control gets -4[life] until end of turn.

rule.description: A unit without immortality with 0 or less life dies due to state based actions.

name: Guarded Dissipation
effect: Prevent the next Level 1+Draw a card.
effect_raw:
Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn where X is the greatest power among Sword weapons you control. 

[Level 1+] Draw a card.
flavor: An impeccible parry to nullify any assault.

name: Innervate Knowledge
effect: As an additional cost to activate this card, delevel your champion and recover 5. (To delevel your champion, return the top card of its lineage to its owner's material deck.) Draw two cards.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to activate this card, delevel your champion and recover 5. (To delevel your champion, return the top card of its lineage to to its owner's material deck.)

Draw two cards.

rule.description: The additional cost of recover 5 means that there must be five damage counters to remove from your champion to pay this card's cost. If there are less than five damage counters on your champion, the additional cost can't be paid.

name: Ocean's Blessing
effect: Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.) Linked ally gets +1 and has taunt. Class BonusFloating Memory
effect_raw:
Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)

Linked ally gets +1 Life and has taunt.

[Class Bonus] Floating Memory

name: Protective Fractal
effect: Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.) : Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target champion this turn.
effect_raw:
Reservable (While paying for a reserve cost, you may rest this object to pay for 1 of that cost.)

Rest: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target champion this turn.

name: Refracting Missile
effect: Deal damage to target unit equal to the amount of Fractals you control plus 1. Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Deal damage to target unit equal to the amount of Fractals you control plus 1.

Floating Memory

name: Riptide Slash
effect: Class BonusOn Attack: Glimpse 2. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.) On Kill: You may put the top card of your deck into your graveyard.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] On Attack: Glimpse 2. 

On Kill: You may put the top card of your deck into your graveyard.

name: Song of Frost
effect: Class Bonus You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard rather than pay this card's reserve cost. If a unit is attacking, end the combat phase. (As a phase ends, banish all triggers, activations, and materializations on the effects stack.)
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard rather than pay this card's reserve cost.

If a unit is attacking, end the combat phase. (As a phase ends, banish all triggers, activations, and materializations on the effects stack.)

rule.description: When the combat phase ends abruptly due to Song of Frost, the combat phase clean up still happens. During this time, cards in intents are moved to the graveyard (they are not banished like activations on the stack).

name: Anthem of Vitality
effect: Target Animal or Beast ally gets +3 and gains spellshroud until end of turn. Harmonize — If you've activated a Melody card this turn, put two buff counters on an Animal or Beast ally you control.
effect_raw:
Target Animal or Beast ally gets +3 life and gains spellshroud until end of turn.

Harmonize  — If you've activated a Melody card this turn, put two buff counters on an Animal or Beast ally you control.
flavor: Gaia's anthem invigorates the woodland.

name: Corhazi Outlook
effect: On Enter: Put a preparation counter on your champion. Class BonusRemove a preparation counter from your champion: Opponents can't activate cards this turn. Glimpse 1. Activate this ability only during your turn.
effect_raw:
On Enter: Put a preparation counter on your champion.

[Class Bonus] Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Opponents can't activate cards this turn. Glimpse 1. Activate this ability only during your turn.

name: Dematerialize
effect: Return target regalia to its owner's material deck.
effect_raw: Return target regalia to its owner's material deck.
flavor:
Things worn and torn need not be spurned
to ash and dust. They'll be returned
with new life and purpose earned.

name: Displace
effect: Banish target ally, then return it to the field under its owner's control rested. Class BonusPut an enlighten counter on your champion.
effect_raw:
Banish target ally, then return it to the field under its owner's control rested.

[Class Bonus] Put an enlighten counter on your champion.
flavor: "Oh my. Be careful where you land."

name: Green Slime
effect: Pride 3 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 3 or higher.)On Enter: Put two buff counters on Green Slime. Class BonusOn Leave: Put the buff counters that were on Green Slime on target ally you control.
effect_raw:
Pride 3 (This ally won't obey you unless your champion is level 3 or higher.)

On Enter: Put two buff counters on Green Slime. 

[Class Bonus] On Leave: Put the buff counters that were on Green Slime on target ally you control.

name: Innervate Agility
effect: As an additional cost to activate this card, delevel your champion and recover 5. (To delevel your champion, return the top card of its lineage to its owner's material deck.) Units you control gain your choice of stealth or spellshroud until end of turn.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to activate this card, delevel your champion and recover 5. (To delevel your champion, return the top card of its lineage to its owner's material deck.)

Units you control gain your choice of stealth or spellshroud until end of turn. (Units with spellshroud can't be targeted by Spells.)

rule.description: The additional cost of recover 5 means that there must be five damage counters to remove from your champion to pay this card's cost. If there are less than five damage counters on your champion, the additional cost can't be paid.

name: Intrepid Spearman
effect: Level 1+If attack damage would be dealt to Intrepid Spearman, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is wind element, prevent 3 of that damage. Apply this replacement effect only once per turn.
effect_raw: [Level 1+] The first time attack damage would be dealt to Intrepid Spearman each turn, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is wind element, prevent 3 of that damage.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'The first time attack damage would be dealt to Intrepid Spearman each turn, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is wind element, prevent 3 of that damage. ->' 'If attack damage would be dealt to Intrepid Spearman, reveal a card at random from your memory. If that card is wind element, prevent 3 of that damage. Apply this replacement effect only once per turn.'

flavor: A master lancer, trained to deflect even projectiles.

name: Mark of Fervor
effect: Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.) Linked ally gets +1 and +1, and has vigor.
effect_raw:
Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)

Linked ally gets +1 Power and +1 Life, and has vigor.
flavor: Through powerful bonds, one's inner strength can freely flourish.

name: Parcenet, Royal Maid
effect: Level 2+Stealth (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.) : Glimpse 1. Reveal the top card of your deck. When you reveal a wind element card this way, another target ally you control gains stealth until end of turn.
effect_raw:
[Level 2+] Stealth (This unit can't be targeted by attacks unless permitted by true sight.)

Rest: Glimpse 1. Reveal the top card of your deck. When you reveal a wind element card this way, another target ally you control gains stealth until end of turn.

rule.description: When you reveal a wind card from Parcenet's ability, there is a trigger to give another target ally stealth. This trigger is put on the stack and may be responded to.

name: Rally the Peasants
effect: Class BonusThis card costs 3 less to activate if an opponent controls three or more allies. Look at the top six cards of your deck. You may reveal a Human card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] This card costs 3 less to activate if an opponent controls three or more allies.

Look at the top six cards of your deck. You may reveal a Human card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Scatter Essence
effect: Destroy target phantasia. Floating Memory (While paying for a memory cost, you may banish this card from your graveyard to pay for 1 of that cost.)
effect_raw:
Destroy target phantasia. 

Floating Memory
flavor: "Invasive hexes will not be tolerated within this castle."

name: Windrider Invoker
effect: On Enter: You may remove two enlighten counters from your champion. If you do, draw a card and Windrider Invoker gets +3 until end of turn.
effect_raw: On Enter: You may remove two enlighten counters from your champion. If you do, draw a card and Windrider Invoker gets +3 Power until end of turn.
flavor: A burst of wind to dash through the battlefield. Another to take down the enemy.

name: Shock Therapy
effect: Class BonusElement BonusWhenever this card is banished from your memory, put an enlighten counter on your champion. Deal an amount of damage to target ally equal to the amount of enlighten counters on your champion.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] [Element Bonus] Whenever this card is banished from your memory, put an enlighten counter on your champion.

Deal an amount of damage to target ally equal to the amount of enlighten counters on your champion.

name: Voltaic Sphere
effect: Deal 3 damage to target unit. If that unit is an ally, deal 5 damage to it instead. Class BonusBanish Voltaic Sphere from your graveyard: The next arcane element Spell card you activate this turn costs 1 less to activate.
effect_raw:
Deal 3 damage to target unit. If that unit is an ally, deal 5 damage to it instead. 

[Class Bonus] Banish Voltaic Sphere from your graveyard: The next arcane element Spell card you activate this turn costs 1 less to activate.

name: Incarnate Majesty
effect: Class Bonus Efficiency
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Efficiency

This card costs 1 less to activate for each regalia weapon card in your banishment. 

Put a card named The Majestic Spirit from your material deck or banishment onto the field.

name: Slay the King
effect: Class BonusOn Attack: You may banish a card from your material deck. If you do, Slay the King gains "On Kill: You may play the banished card."
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] On Attack: You may banish a card from your material deck. If you do, Slay the King gains "On Kill: You may play the banished card."

rule.description: When you play the banished card, you play that card using its default play type. If the card has a reserve cost, that card is activated. If the card has a memory cost, that card is materialized.
The banished card being played still checks for elemental requirements and its costs must be paid.

flavor: Treachery strikes deadliest in the heart.

name: Illuminate Secrets
effect: Deal an amount of damage to target unit equal to its owner's influence minus your influence. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.)
effect_raw: Deal an amount of damage to target unit equal to its owner's influence minus your influence. (A player's influence is equal to the total amount of cards in their hand and memory.)
flavor: The light protects those unjustly oppressed.

name: Uther, Illustrious King
effect: Intercept, Vigor On Enter: You may rest Uther. When you do, banish another target non-champion object. On Leave: Return the banished object to the field under its owner's control rested.
effect_raw:
Intercept, Vigor
On Enter: You may rest Uther. When you do, banish another target non-champion object.
On Leave: Return the banished object to the field under its owner's control rested.

name: Avatar of Gaia
effect: Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.) Class BonusPreserve Linked ally has taunt and loses pride.
effect_raw:
Ally Link (This object enters the field linked to target ally. If the link is broken, sacrifice this object.)

[Class Bonus] Preserve

Linked ally has taunt and loses pride.

rule.description: All instances of pride on the linked ally are removed.

flavor: Even the king of beasts rallied to Gaia's presence.

name: Kraal, Stonescale Tyrant
effect: As an additional cost to activate this card, banish two preserved cards from your material deck. Intercept, Spellshroud, True Sight, Vigor Class BonusOn Attack: Reveal the top two cards of your deck and put them into your material deck preserved.
effect_raw:
As an additional cost to activate this card, banish two preserved cards from your material deck.

Intercept, Spellshroud, True Sight, Vigor

[Class Bonus] On Attack: Reveal the top two cards of your deck and put them into your material deck preserved.
